sentence.Network_en: Paul was unwell last night with a stomach upset.
She said she was feeling unwell and went home.
sentence.Network_cn: 她说她感觉不舒服回家了。
他今天早上觉得不舒服.

entry.def: If you are unwell, you are ill.

example.ex: He had been riding in Hyde Park, but felt unwell as he was being driven back to his office late this afternoon.
example.tran: 他一直在海德公园骑自行车，后来感到不舒服，近黄昏时被人开车送回办公室。

means.word_mean: 2. somewhat ill or prone to illness;
